Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: OCBC 365 Credit Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: 3% cashback on online shopping, groceries, recurring telecommunication bills and medical fees.
18.3% fuel savings (14% upfront discount and 5% cashback) at Esso and Caltex stations. 5% cashback at all other petrol stations.
6% on weekend dining, 3% on weekday and overseas dining.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Cashback amount is capped at S$80 per calendar month.
If spending is less than S$600, a flat 0.3% cashback is awarded.
Accumulate spending of S$600 in a calendar month to qualify for 3% cashback.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: 6% Cashback on Weekend Dining (Hotel Dining till 31 Mar 2016)
3% Cashback on Weekday Dining and Overseas Dining (Hotel Dining till 31 Mar 2016)
3% Cashback on Grocery and Recurring Telecommunications bill
Get 3% Cashback on all Online spend (travel, fashion, movie tickets, etc.)
Up to 18.3% Fuel Savings at selected petrol stations
Minimum spend of $600/month, $80 cap /month. For spend less than $600, a flat 0.3% cashback is awarded

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: 3% Cashback on Local Weekday Dining (Mondays to Fridays) (Hotel Dining till 31 Mar 2016)
3% Cashback on Overseas Dining (Everyday)
6% Cashback on Local Weekend Dining (Sat and Sun) (Hotel Dining till 31 Mar 2016)

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: 3% rebates on online spending with min. spend $600 in a month
4 Golden Village regular movie tickets for the price of 3
0.3% on all other spend

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: 3% Cashback on Grocery Shopping at all supermarkets islandwide

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 18.3% Fuel Savings / 14% instant discount at Caltex and Esso, (14% onsite and OCBC 365 discount + 5% Cashback*)
5% Cashback at all other petrol stations
*Minimum spend of $600/month, $80 cap /month

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Get 3% Cashback on all Online spend (travel, fashion, movie tickets, etc.)
0.3% on all other spend

Details.Name: sc_main_image
Details.Feature: ./images/OCBC 365 Credit Card.png
